message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. This is my best offer, let me know if you're willing to work with me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10500 is still a bit below what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down to $10750.  This is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product to you.  I'm hoping we can close this deal.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $10750 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $10250. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
